alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Hamilton; Thayer; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:38PM CDT until July 04 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR EASTERN CLAY...NORTHEASTERN NUCKOLLS...SOUTHERN YORK... SOUTHEASTERN HAMILTON...FILLMORE AND THAYER COUNTIES... At 738 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Shickley, or 34 miles south of York, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... York, Geneva, Hebron, Sutton, Henderson, Deshler, Exeter, Fairmont, McCool Junction, Shickley, Davenport, Milligan, Bruning, Waco, Alexandria, Grafton, Ohiowa, Carleton, Ong and Belvidere. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 345 and 365. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
